name: Food Truck Store Cash Register
description:
Get ready to run your personal food van & spread the food truck craze in Food Truck Store Cash Register adventure. In this beautifully designed truck cooking game, you will be given a chance to run realistic food truck business of master chef with amazing food truck cooking as highly skilled cashier manager or cashier girl. As a kid, you would have always to shadow adult’s real-life activities, how about handling cash on real cash register as a highly pro cashier with fast track based chef cooking & time management in a realistic environment. Food Truck Store Cash Register is an innovatively designed educational game which facilitates you to successfully handle the rush of customers.


Food Truck Store Cash Register lets you play in realistic food truck environment; you as a highly professional cashier or cashier girl has to manage different customers orders on cash register utilizing your highly professional cash management & time management skills along with highly optimized money receiving or collecting methodologies. So what are you waiting for prepare yourself to download best money management simulation game or highly addictive cash handling game of the year?

Silent Features:

- Highly colorful graphics realistic store environment!
- Multiple highly addictive cash register simulation based levels!
- Multiple payments collecting procedures like cash, credit card or NFC & more!
- Beautiful sound & effects of best cashier app!
- Different fast food items providing you perfect opportunity to handle different items!
- Receive rewards for a satisfying customer with advanced time management simulation!
